lead_paragraph: Four Tennessee basketball players, including the starting senior forward Tyler Smith, are facing felony gun and misdemeanor drug charges.
snippet: Four Tennessee basketball players, including the starting senior forward Tyler Smith, are facing felony gun and misdemeanor drug charges.

headline.main: 4 Vols Face Drug and Gun Charges
